definition: to study away from home or abroad (old)

sentences.english: There are hundreds of ways you can enrich your vacation experience with educational travel.
sentences.chinese: 在“遊學”中有上百種選擇可以豐盛你的旅途。

sentences.english: My child may participate in all aspects of the course.
sentences.chinese: 我的子女可參與所有遊學團之活動。

sentences.english: Provides a communal space for teachers and students to relax .
sentences.chinese: 提供來村遊學的教師及學生休憩的場所。

sentences.english: Way of reversing of studying the relation of Japanese while discussing from two aspects on translating and studying abroad.
sentences.chinese: 從翻譯和遊學兩方面談中日文學關係的逆轉途徑。

sentences.english: For collage students, it is encouraging to travel abroad during summer or winder vacation.
sentences.chinese: 大學生利用寒暑假出國遊學儼然形成一種風潮。

sentences.english: Tourism science should be based on the contradictions.
sentences.chinese: 構建科學的旅遊學體系，應以此爲基礎。

sentences.english: I confirm the mentioned student is suitable for participating in "Four-day" Trip to Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 本人確認上述學生適宜參加新加坡遊學團。

sentences.english: She says students should begin to gather information a year before they want to travel.
sentences.chinese: 她說學生在他們想要遊學的前一年應該開始收集信息。

sentences.english: Tourism consumption has been the main research object on tourism.
sentences.chinese: 考察旅遊者的消費，一直是旅遊學研究的傳統領域。

sentences.english: I'm on the study & Travel program.
This summer I join the I-Shou University's overseas summer program .
sentences.chinese: 這個暑假，我參加了義守大學的海外遊學計劃。

sentences.english: The disciplinary system of tourism science entitles a variety of classifications.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊學的學科體系可以有多種分類。

sentences.english: One of my reasons I attended the study tour was to improve my English.
sentences.chinese: 我參加遊學的原因之一是想提高自己的英語水平。

definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to train together/to practice as a group
